title: Ticket #2237: AuthenticatedIdentity is not documented
description: The classad attribute AuthenticatedIdentity is not documented in the manual. This attribute is inserted by the collector into all ads sent to the collector. The value of the attribute is the authenticated name assigned by the collector to the daemon that published the ad.
remarks:
Dan, I added this definition to the subsection titled "ClassAd Attributes Added by the condor_collector". Is that the correct section? And, this subsection is prefaced by the statement that "These attributes are only added if COLLECTOR_DAEMON_STATS is True". Is that in fact True for this attribute?

2011-Aug-01 16:46:59 by danb:
Karen, that does seem like the right section, but it is not true that COLLECTOR_DAEMON_STATS has any influence over AuthenticatedIdentity. Perhaps a blurb about COLLECTOR_DAEMON_STATS should just be pasted into the description of each attribute that it affects.
check_ins: 2011-Aug-15 11:52   Check-in [26796]: documented attribute AuthenticatedIdentity ===GT:Fixed=== #2237 (By Karen Miller )
creator: danb
